summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.5°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 270 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1735 m), feels like temperature (up 5.8°C), outside temperature (up 4.5°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 270.0m lower than yesterday, 1172.8m lower than past week, 1734.9m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 995.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2170m and 2730m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and the light is absent. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
